articles.title: Stephen Colbert says network lawyers pulled James Talarico interview over FCC equal time fears
articles.description:
"And because my network clearly doesn’t want us to talk about this, let’s talk about this."

The post Stephen Colbert says network lawyers pulled James Talarico interview over FCC equal time fears appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Stephen Colbert's interview with James Talarico was canceled due to FCC equal time regulations.
Talarico, a Texas state representative, was scheduled to discuss local issues affecting Boston residents.
The cancellation raises concerns about media access for local politicians in Boston.

articles.title: His future wife survived a medical emergency thanks to Boston MedFlight
articles.description:
"I am not in the medical field, but I have the most profound respect for anyone in that profession."

The post His future wife survived a medical emergency thanks to Boston MedFlight appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Boston MedFlight successfully transported a patient during a critical medical emergency.
Sean Largay's future wife was saved thanks to the rapid response of Boston MedFlight.
This incident highlights the importance of local emergency medical services for Boston residents.

articles.title: He’s running the Boston Marathon to support young athletes
articles.description:
"Running can transform lives."

The post He’s running the Boston Marathon to support young athletes appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Ahmed Mansour is running the Boston Marathon to raise funds for young athletes.
Funds will support the Boston Athletic Academy, benefiting local youth sports programs.
The marathon takes place on April 17, 2023, impacting community engagement in athletics.

articles.title: American Eagle Outfitters to close Devens distribution facility, cutting 103 jobs
articles.description:
The company says layoffs will start on April 12.

The post American Eagle Outfitters to close Devens distribution facility, cutting 103 jobs appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: American Eagle Outfitters will close its Devens distribution facility on April 12.
The closure will result in 103 job losses for local workers.
Affected employees will face layoffs, impacting the Devens community's economy.

articles.title: Mass. lowers flags to half-staff in honor of fallen soldier Robert Arnold
articles.description:
After passing away at just 27 years old, the Roslindale native is being remembered for his service in the Army and Marine Corps.

The post Mass. lowers flags to half-staff in honor of fallen soldier Robert Arnold appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Massachusetts lowers flags to half-staff for 27-year-old soldier Robert Arnold from Roslindale.
Arnold served in both the Army and Marine Corps, honoring his dedication.
Residents can pay respects as flags remain at half-staff in his memory.

articles.title: Healey, Ayotte spar over proposed ICE facility in N.H.
articles.description:
ICE wants to turn a warehouse in Merrimack, New Hampshire, into a detention center that could house as many as 600 people.

The post Healey, Ayotte spar over proposed ICE facility in N.H. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Massachusetts Governor Maura Healey opposes ICE's proposed 600-person detention center in Merrimack, NH.
Former New Hampshire Senator Kelly Ayotte supports the facility, citing security concerns.
Local residents worry about increased immigration enforcement and its effects on community relations.
